Text: Dear Taeguki San, Hontoni Domo Arigato Gozaimasu for all the torrents of Japanese animation. I believe Nippon Animation is one of the best in the world. Nippon! Nippon! Nippon!

Dear Taeguki San, Hontoni Domo Arigato Gozaimasu for all the torrents of Japanese animation. I believe Nippon Animation is one of the best in the world. But it is just a pitty that some of these Japanese anime cannot be downloaded, because of no seeder, and no leecher. So would you please seed these torrents yourself. Dozo Yoroshiku Onegaitashimasu.
This is "Eating a Jumbo Ramen". No mention was made of "green peppers"/piman. The video quality is low -- appears to be a VHS capture. The subtitles are fine as is the audio.
Oh, and thank you for all these Taegugki.
